item.title: Liverpool FC Victory Parade: Driver Plows Into Crowd, Injuring 47

item.title: Dozens Injured After Car Plows Into Crowd in Liverpool
item.description: Local police said they detained a man in connection with a car that was driven through a crowd of people attending a soccer parade on Monday.

item.title: King Charles III Visits Canada as Trump Threatens Its Sovereignty: What to Know
item.description: The British monarch, who is Canada’s official head of state, is coming at a moment when President Trump has threatened the country’s sovereignty.
